question: Which aircraft model was most frequently used for transatlantic flights in 2024?
query:
SELECT a.model, COUNT(*) AS flight_count
FROM postgres_air.flight f
JOIN postgres_air.aircraft a ON f.aircraft_code = a.code
JOIN postgres_air.airport dep ON f.departure_airport = dep.airport_code
JOIN postgres_air.airport arr ON f.arrival_airport = arr.airport_code
WHERE f.scheduled_departure >= '2024-01-01'
  AND f.scheduled_departure < '2025-01-01'
  AND ((dep.continent IN ('NA', 'SA') AND arr.continent IN ('EU', 'AF')) OR
      (dep.continent IN ('EU', 'AF') AND arr.continent IN ('NA', 'SA')))
GROUP BY a.model
ORDER BY flight_count DESC
LIMIT 1;
